summary: Trying to transmute alot of iron to silver? Tired of having to drop your new silver ore after each cast? Now you dont have to.
descriptionHtml:
[i]
[size=6]"I almost cried the first time I used this"[/size][b] [size=4]- [/size][/b][/i][b][size=4]Firedragon17[/size][/b]


[color=#ffff00]DESCRIPTION:[/color]
Trying to transmute alot of iron to silver? Tired of having to drop your new silver ore after each cast to prevent from making gold ore? Now you dont have to.

The default behaviour of Transmute favors more valuable ore first. This edited version of the spell favors less valuable ore. The result is that if you have any iron ore left in your inventory, it will continue making silver out of it on each successive cast. Only when you dont have any iron ore left will it turn silver to gold.

[b][color=yellow]VERSION 2:[/color][/b]
Attempts to transmutes two ores at a time. If there is not enough ore, it will only transmute one. If it is able to transmute two ores, you will get double the experience (as if casted twice). This version is merely a time saver with no drawbacks whatsoever. If you would prefer to transmute one at a time, download Version 1.


[b][color=yellow]VERSION 3:[/color][/b]
Works similar to the previous versions except each cast attempts to transmutes ALL lowest level ore to the next higher level. Gives skill use experience based on how many ores are transmuted. [color=lime][b]HUGE TIME SAVER![/b][/color]


[color=yellow]NOTE:[/color]
This is just a script replacer. There is no plugin to activate.





[b]Other mods by me:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36534]Bounty Gold[/url] - 100 gold for killing a dragon? No thanks!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11025]Transmute Iorn Ore First[/url] - Essential if you like crafting jewelry.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22940]Functional Homes[/url] - Make every home your current home.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36512]Light Foot Only While Sneaking[/url] - Don't sneak without it!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36514]Alchemy Tree Re-organized[/url] - Specialize in Potions or Poisons.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22996]No Leveled Item Rewards[/url] - Get the best reward item regardless of your level.
author: gorey666
